home.title: Marketing is

promote.sub_content: Landing Page enables your visitors to get what they came for. Determine a target action you would like a user to take and make use of our suggested tools. You can ask a user to sign up, leave an email, choose a pricing plan or redirect him to another page. Use Flexy to increase your conversion rate. Do A/B testing. Use various suggested modules from Flexy theme to create different landing pages. The page with more conversions (more people taking action) wins.
